content: I want to download Linux but I don't know how... I have always ran Windows and I'm honestly kind of tired of it and want a change. After careful consideration and lots of research, I've decided I want to switch to Linux for several reasons. For example, it's safer, easier to use and from what I can tell, less clunky. The only problem is, is that I don't know how. If someone can assist me I would be very grateful. Thanks!

I updated arch 2 days ago. I use i3wm. My terminal does not work, chromium does not work but firefox works. I even changed window managers but this issue persists.
Please help.
Thank you.
